## ScreenCapture.startCapture() method

申请开始录屏

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static startCapture( options : ScreenCaptureOptions, mode : ScreenCaptureMode, path : string) : ScreenCaptureError;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [ScreenCaptureOptions](./extractor.screencaptureoptions.md) | 录屏参数 |
|  mode | [ScreenCaptureMode](./extractor.screencapturemode.md) | 录屏种类 |
|  path | string | 录屏存储路径,需指向以"/sdcard"为根目录的mp4文件,且该文件所在目录应已经存在  { ScreenCaptureError } |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ScreenCaptureError](./extractor.screencaptureerror.md)
